text: Supplied video obtained Friday, October 18, 2019, of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson and European Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker speaking at a press conference in Brussels after EU leaders gave their backing to a new EU-UK Withdrawal Agreement. "This is a fair, balanced agreement," Mr Juncker says. "It is a testament to our commitment to finding solutions. "It provides certainty, where Brexit creates uncertainty. "It protects the rights of our citizens and it protects peace and stability on the island of Ireland. Mr Johnson says he now hopes his fellow MP's vote in favour of the agreement. (AAP VIDEO/Supplied/European Commission)
